entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sutton

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
